captions.text:
Neo wakes up and needs to
follow the white rabbit.

Morpheus: "Take the
blue pill, and enjoy the

"Take the red pill, and
Kansas is going bye-bye."
Voiceover: They throw-down in a sweet

mano-a-mano fight scene
until Morpheus is all -

Morpheus: "Stop trying
to hit me and hit me."
Voiceover: They go to see chain-smoking,
Aunt Jemima: "You're not the one, kid."
and Morpheus is captured by agents,
Neo and Trinity launch a rescue attempt,

Neo: "Woah! Look out dude,
bullets coming through."

Voiceover: Agent Smith finally
catches up with Neo in the

subway station where they
have an epic showdown.

Agent Smith: "Now arriving
on the platform, your face."
Neo: "I'm going to rail you so hard -

"Why don't they just use
another animal for energy?"
